TEST.0.title: 2023 North Carolina Division B Regional 2
TEST.0.customHeader:
Names of participants: (Please print neatly)

 
 
 
School Name:

Check your team:  ◻ Varsity     ◻ JV1      JV2     ◻ JV3

Warning: Do not open this packet until given permission to do so.

Note: There are useful notes after this page.

CIPHER.218.cipherString: Give me the liberty to know, to utter, and to argue freely according to conscience, above all liberties.
CIPHER.218.question: A quote from John Milton has been encoded as an Aristocrat, what does it say? When you have solved it, raise your hand so that the time can be recorded and the solution checked.

CIPHER.221.cipherString: Eternal law has arranged nothing better than this, that it has given us one way in to life, but many ways out.
CIPHER.221.question: Decode a quote by Seneca that has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher and a K1 alphabet. You are told that it contains the words IN and OUT.

CIPHER.236.cipherString: A companion is but another self; wherefore it is an argument that a man is wicked if he keep company with the wicked.
CIPHER.236.question: A quote from St. Clement has been encoded with the Caesar Cipher. What does it say?

CIPHER.241.cipherString: Breathe in, take what life hands you; hold it, accept it; breathe out, let it go.
CIPHER.241.question: A quote by Susan Gable has been encoded using the Rail Fence Cipher for you to decode. You are told that between 3 and 5 rails were used to encode it.

CIPHER.228.cipherString: Tánto puedes aprender cuando falles determina qué tan lejos llegarás para alcanzar tus metas.
CIPHER.228.question: Solve this Xenocrypt which is a translation of a quote by Roy T. Bennett into Spanish and has been encoded with a K1 alphabet using an English keyword.  You are told that it ends in ETAS.
CIPHER.228.translation: How much you can learn when you fail determines how far you will go into achieving your goals.

CIPHER.231.cipherString: Time flies over us, but leaves its shadow behind.
CIPHER.231.question: A quote by HAWTHORNE has been encoded using the Morbit Cipher for you to decode. You are told that 9=●–, 8=●×, 2=–×, 7=×–, 1=––

CIPHER.242.cipherString: For each answer in life there are ten more questions that need answering.
CIPHER.242.question: A quote by Anthony T. Hincks has been encoded using the Rail Fence Cipher for you to decode. You are told that between 2 and 4 rails were used to encode it.

CIPHER.240.cipherString: I think that success is having fun.
CIPHER.240.question: The following quote by Bruno Mars needs to be encoded with the Affine Cipher using a=5 and b=15.

CIPHER.219.cipherString: Life is an endless trial and death its certain verdict, but there are many recesses to enjoy before then.
CIPHER.219.question: Solve this Aristocrat which is a quote by Stewart Stafford which has the word VERDICT in it.

CIPHER.227.cipherString: Learn to live with less so that you appreciate more.
CIPHER.227.question: The following strange headlines encode a quote by James Ryan using a Baconian cipher. You are told that the deciphered text ends with MORE

CIPHER.238.cipherString: Your challenge will never get easier, but you will get stronger if you don't quit.
CIPHER.238.question: Solve this quote from Toni Sorenson which has been encoded with the Atbash Cipher.

CIPHER.232.cipherString: Those who hurt others will also hurt themselves.
CIPHER.232.question: A quote by Natsuki Takaya has been encoded using the Morbit Cipher for you to decode. You are told that 8=●●, 9=–×, 2=×–, 6=●×, 4=●–, 7=–●

CIPHER.237.cipherString: There is nothing ridiculous in seeming to be what you really are, but a good deal in affecting to be what you are not.
CIPHER.237.question: A quote from Sir J. Lubbock has been encoded with the Caesar Cipher. What does it say?

CIPHER.223.cipherString: Freinds come and go, lkie teh wayvs of teh oshun, but teh tru ones stay, lkie an octopous on you're face.
CIPHER.223.question: Your friend offered you some advice in the form of a Cryptogram, but they are a terrible speller.  You are told it starts with the word FREINDS.

CIPHER.234.question: After solving the cryptarithm SPEAK+STYLE=COSTLY decode the phrase 785146 95321087.

CIPHER.225.cipherString: Fear defeats more people than any other one thing in the world.
CIPHER.225.question: The following symbols encodes a phrase by Ralph Waldo Emerson using a Baconian alphabet. What does it say?

CIPHER.226.cipherString: It is always the simple that produces the marvelous.
CIPHER.226.question: The following symbols encodes a phrase by Amelia Barr using a Baconian alphabet. What does it say?

CIPHER.220.cipherString: My favorite part of Fall is walking through a hundred spider webs a day and screaming every single time.
CIPHER.220.question: Solve this Aristocrat which is a quote which has the word PART in it.

CIPHER.235.cipherString: If you do what you've always done, you'll get what you've always gotten.
CIPHER.235.question: The following quote by Tony Robbins needs to be decoded with the Porta Cipher with a keyword of CYCLE

CIPHER.224.cipherString: Your ordinary acts of love and hope point to the extraordinary promise that every human life is of inestimable value.
CIPHER.224.question: A famous phrase from Desmond Tutu has been encoded as a Patristocrat using a K1 alphabet. It starts with the letters YOURO. What did they say?

CIPHER.222.cipherString: The universe is like a safe to which there is a combination - but the combination is locked up in the safe.
CIPHER.222.question: Decode a quote by Peter DeVries that has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher and a K2 alphabet. You are told that it contains the word LIKE in it.

CIPHER.233.cipherString: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
CIPHER.233.question: A quote by William James has been encoded using the FractionatedMorse Cipher for you to decode. You are told that the quote starts with ACT AS IF.

CIPHER.229.cipherString: The real mystery is the known, not the unknown.
CIPHER.229.question: A quote by Marty Rubin has been encoded using the Pollux Cipher for you to decode. You are told that 0=×, 8=●, 4=×, 7=–, 6=×

CIPHER.239.cipherString: Believe that your life is not ordinary and never look down on what you can do to impact a life.
CIPHER.239.question: Encode this quote by Sunday Adelaja using the Atbash Cipher.

CIPHER.230.cipherString: Instead of cursing the darkness, light a candle.
CIPHER.230.question: A quote by Benjamin Franklin has been encoded using the Pollux Cipher for you to decode. You are told that 8=×, 9=–, 2=×, 3=–, 7=●, 5=×
